src_original: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā saḥ nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //  vimarśādhiṣṭhānau pakṣapratipakṣāvubhāvanavasitau prakaraṇam/
tgt_original: 7) vimarśādhiṣṭhānau pakṣapratipakṣāvanavasitau prakaraṇantasya cintāmavimarśāt prabhṛti prāṅnirṇṇayāt parīkṣaṇaṃ sā yatra kṛtā sa nirṇṇayārthaṃ prayuktobhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇamanativarttamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo na nirṇṇayāya kalpyate |

src_original: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇamanativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate/
tgt_original: yasmādupalabdhe-tatverthe nivarttate cintā tasmātsāmānyenādhigatasya yā viśeṣato'nupalabdhiḥ sā prakaraṇacintāṃ prayojayatīti |

src_original: yantra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate,  sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva/
tgt_original: yatra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇahetutvenopādīyate saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva |

src_original: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiśca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati/
tgt_original: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣatobhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhau sā prakaraṇampravartayati |

src_original: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyate evamanityadharmaḥ api/
tgt_original: yathā ca śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyate tathānityadharmopi |

src_original: seyamubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiḥ prakaraṇacintāṃ pravartayati/  katham? viparyaye hi prakaraṇanivṛtteḥ/
tgt_original: seyamubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiḥ prakaraṇacintāmprayojayati kathamviparyaye prakaraṇanivṛtteḥ |  yadi nityadharmaḥ śabde gṛhyetana syātprakaraṇaṃ |

src_original: sādhyaṃ tāvadetat---kiṃ puruṣavacchāyāpi gacchati āho svidāvarakadravye saṃsarpati āvaraṇasantānādasannidhisantāno 'yaṃ tejaso gṛhyata iti/  sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yastejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhirevāvicchinno gṛhyata iti/  āvaraṇaṃ tu prāptipratiṣedhaḥ // 8//  NyS_1,2.9: kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātītaḥ //  kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ityucyate/
tgt_original: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ityucyate |

src_original: prāgūrddhaṃ ca vyakteravasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
tgt_original: prāgūrddhvaṃ ca vyakteravasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate |

src_original: tathā ca śabdo 'pyavasthito bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogena vyajyate,  dāruparaśusaṃyogena vā/
tgt_original: tathā śabdo vyavasthito bherīkarṇṇasaṃyogena dāruparṇayogena vā vyajyate |

src_original: tasmātsaṃyogavyaṅgyatvānnityaḥ śabda ityayamahetuḥ kālātyayāpadeśāt/  vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktiratyeti/
tgt_original: tasmātsaṃyogavyaṃgyatvānnityaḥ śabda iti |  ayamahetuḥ kālātyayāpadeśāt vyaṃjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṃgyasya rūpasya vyaktiratyeti sati pradīpasaṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati |

src_original: na nivṛtte saṃyoge rūpaṃ gṛhyate/  nivṛtte tu dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle/
tgt_original: nivṛtte tu dāruparṇasaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle seyaṃ śabdasya vyaktiḥ saṃyogakālamatyetīti saṃyoganimittā bhavati |
